<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns value of the specified controller.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> position '''getEnvSoundController''' controller

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> position: [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> controller: [[String]] - name of environmental variable like "trees" or "houses"

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>[[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[position]] [[player]] [[getEnvSoundController]] "trees"; //0.3333</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[selectBestPlaces]], [[getSoundController]], [[getSoundControllerResult]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]], [[getAllSoundControllers]], [[getCustomSoundController]], [[setCustomSoundController]], [[getCustomSoundControllerCount]], [[Arma 3 Sound]]
</value></part></template>
